query.sql: SELECT f.*, p.power_id, IFNULL(p.role_id ,${@role_id}) role_id, p.enable_flag, p.last_update_date p_last_update_date, (SELECT CONCAT(CONCAT(user_code,'-'),user_name) FROM SYS_USER WHERE user_id = p.last_update_by) last_update_user, (SELECT CONCAT(CONCAT(module_code,'-'),module_name) FROM sys_module WHERE module_id = f.function_module) module_code_name FROM SYS_FUNCTION f LEFT JOIN SYS_POWER p ON f.function_id = p.function_id AND p.role_id = ${@role_id} #WHERE_CLAUSE# ORDER BY f.function_code

whenSql.executeSql: INSERT INTO SYS_POWER (function_id, role_id, create_by, create_date, last_update_by, last_update_date, enable_flag) VALUES (${@function_id}, ${@role_id}, ${@user_id}, NOW(), ${@user_id}, NOW(), ${@enable_flag})
update sys_power set enable_flag = ${@enable_flag} , last_update_by = ${@user_id} , last_update_date = NOW() where power_id = ${@power_id}
